ratings.comment: Without the extra credit, it is hard to get an A. But with extra credits, you'll be able to get a good grade in this class.

Well,I should say this is really a boring class. However, for anyone who needs bio credits, this class would be the best choice because it's much easier to get an A than any other biological courses on campus!

Easy class and easy A.  Tests are hard, but tons of extra credit.  No reason to not get an A.  Info is also presented in a clear understandable manner. Class highly recommended even if you just need 2 crs for science.

This is the easiest class I have ever taken at UW, mostly because of the extra credit. There are 3 extra credit reports worth a max of 25 points. Their are also 15 extra credit points randomly given for attendance. 94 points is an A in this class and their are 140 possible points including extra credit. Class has a 50 point mid term and final.
Must-take class.  A for sure if you do the extra credit.  I got 65/100 on the exams and got over 100% in the class.  Think about it.

Do the extra creidt. That's potentially 35% of your grade. If you do that, then congradulations on your A. His two exam averages are actually low but with the extra credit it just doesn't matter. When you're tired of work, and the man has got you down. Who you gonna call? Ray Guries!
Really easy....thats pretty much all you have to say for this class. You might as well just take it so that your GPA goes up a few points.

I wasn't interested in the topic at all, I just needed an easy science class to fill some requirements.  Pretty easy, tons of extra credit (for coming to class and doing extra reports), 94/135 points earns you an A.  Lectures are boring with occasional jokes.
One of the easiest classes at UW-definitely take him if you need an A.  Tons of extra credit made it so I needed like a 30% on the final to get an A.
Wow, the easiest A ever.  Definitely take this class, but beware--you'll need to put up with some reallllly boring lectures.  Ray G's a great guy though and gives infinte extra credit.
